task6.money

Class CurrencyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • task6.money.CurrencyManager

  • public class CurrencyManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a manager for manipulating currency.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CurrencyManager()
      Creates a currency manager.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Money getExchangeProfit()
      Returns the profit accumulated over all transactions as a result of not making perfect change.
      java.util.List<A_Currency> makeChange(Money amount)
      Returns the optimal list of currency coin denominations that correspond to a money amount.
      Money sumCurrency(java.util.List<A_Currency> denominations)
      Calculates the sum of a list of currency denominations.

    • Method Detail

      • getExchangeProfit

        public Money getExchangeProfit()
        Returns the profit accumulated over all transactions as a result of not making perfect change.
        Returns:
        the profit

      • makeChange

        public java.util.List<A_Currency> makeChange(Money amount)
        Returns the optimal list of currency coin denominations that correspond to a money amount. It also maintains the cumulative profit accumulated over all transactions as a result of not making perfect change.
        Parameters:
        amount - - the money amount
        Returns:
        the change, in any order
        See Also:
        getExchangeProfit()

      • sumCurrency

        public Money sumCurrency(java.util.List<A_Currency> denominations)
        Calculates the sum of a list of currency denominations.
        Parameters:
        denominations - - the denominations
        Returns:
        the sum
